	"created_by": "Sarah Friend",
	"name":"Gentle Automata (Touching Grass)",
	"external_url": "https://touchinggrass.isthisa.com/",
	"description":"Launched as part of Code Chronicles at bitforms gallery, curated by Aleksandra Artamonovskaja, this work is a one of one by Sarah Friend. It pairs a swamp-like moire of grass images with a touch-sensitive recreation of John Conwayb�s Game of Life, an early cellular automata that allows patterns that seemingly grow without limits. The simulation is running live at touchinggrass.isthisa.com, and if you are the collector, you are welcome to contact the artist for a copy of the code.",
